00018 void sopt_sparsemat_free(sopt_sparsemat *mat) {
00019 
00020   if(mat->vals != NULL) free(mat->vals);
00021   if(mat->cvals != NULL) free(mat->cvals);
00022   if(mat->rowind != NULL) free(mat->rowind);
00023   if(mat->colptr != NULL) free(mat->colptr);
00024   mat->nrows = 0;
00025   mat->ncols = 0;
00026   mat->nvals = 0;
00027 
00028 }

00045 void sopt_sparsemat_explictmat(double **A, sopt_sparsemat *S) {
00046 
00047   int c, rr;
00048 
00049   // Allocate space for explicit matrix (initialised with zeros).
00050   *A = (double*)calloc(S->nrows * S->ncols, sizeof(double));
00051   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(*A);
00052 
00053   // Construct explicit matrix.
00054   for (c = 0; c < S->ncols; c++)
00055     for (rr = S->colptr[c]; rr < S->colptr[c+1]; rr++)
00056       (*A)[c * S->nrows + S->rowind[rr]] = S->vals[rr];
00057 
00058 }

00074 void sopt_sparsemat_fwd_real(double *y, double *x, sopt_sparsemat *A) {
00075 
00076   int r, rr, c;
00077 
00078   for (r = 0; r < A->nrows; r++)
00079     y[r] = 0.0;
00080 
00081   for (c = 0; c < A->ncols; c++)
00082     for (rr = A->colptr[c]; rr < A->colptr[c+1]; rr++)
00083       y[A->rowind[rr]] += A->vals[rr] * x[c];
00084  
00085 }

00101 void sopt_sparsemat_adj_real(double *y, double *x, sopt_sparsemat *A) {
00102 
00103   int rr, c;
00104 
00105   for (c = 0; c < A->ncols; c++) {
00106     y[c] = 0.0;
00107     for (rr = A->colptr[c]; rr < A->colptr[c+1]; rr++)
00108       y[c] += A->vals[rr] * x[A->rowind[rr]];
00109   }

00127 void sopt_sparsemat_fwd_complex(complex double *y, complex double *x,
00128                                   sopt_sparsemat *A) {
00129 
00130   int r, rr, c;
00131 
00132   for (r = 0; r < A->nrows; r++)
00133     y[r] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00134

00136     for (rr = A->colptr[c]; rr < A->colptr[c+1]; rr++)

00155 void sopt_sparsemat_adj_complex(complex double *y, complex double *x,
00156                                   sopt_sparsemat *A) {
00157 
00158   int rr, c;
00159 
00160   for (c = 0; c < A->ncols; c++) {
00161     y[c] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00162     for (rr = A->colptr[c]; rr < A->colptr[c+1]; rr++)
00163       y[c] += conj(A->cvals[rr]) * x[A->rowind[rr]];
00164   }
